name: Infinity Engine Spellcasting VFX
summary: A VVC file is a visual effects file used to show a spellcasting effect, such as a lightning strike or cone of flame, in BioWare Baldur's Gate II and its expansion, Throne of Bhaal. The file contains binary game data that Baldur's Gate II references when a user casts a spell. Other BioWare Infinity Engine games may also use VVC files.
